pr_title: Enable query metrics by default and fixing NPE in GatewayAddressCache

timeline.message: Adding null-value handling to quey metric validation

timeline.bodyText: how about setting on variable declaration itself
timeline.author: simplynaveen20

replies.bodyText: Looks like the most common pattern has been to initialize in the ctor if a ctor is present - CosmosDatabaseProperties, CosmosTriggerProperties etc. - so followed that approach for consistency.
replies.author: FabianMeiswinkel

timeline.bodyText: why Boolean vs boolean, here and other place ?
timeline.author: simplynaveen20

replies.bodyText: To be able to test default (not explicity set)
replies.author: FabianMeiswinkel

timeline.bodyText:
Looks like we didn't update the java doc at first place that the default value is false.
@FabianMeiswinkel  - now would be a good time to update the java docs to mention that default value is true
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.message: Adding comments explaining default value of QueryMetricEnabled
